xldoc.title: RBJones.com Privacy Policy
xldoc.description: A privacy policy (as required by Google Adsense)

section.abstract: The privacy policy for RBJones.com. This is too naff to actually use!

subsec.p: The privacy policy of this site is simply to obtain no private information. No use is made by the site of cookies, or any other means of gathering information about customers.

However, the site does supply search buttons to enable users of the sites to conduct searches using Google. The use of these buttons involves the execution of javascript, so they will not function as intended unless your browser permits execution of javascript, and the results of such searches as delivered by Google may contain advertisments and may make use of cookies. Third parties may be placing and reading cookies on your browser, or using web beacons to collect information, in the course of ads being served in the results of Google searches on this site. Full details of the privacy implications of using these search facilities should be sought at google.
User options for cookie management are documented at Google.com.
